title: Custom content support
description:
The app now has improved support for custom content!

  • You can load content from multiple sources, manage sources individually, and back up your database from the new Content page.
  • Detailed documentation is now available for content creators. Check out the Content FAQ to get started.

title: Welcome to WeaveLore!
description:
Would you like to help improve this app?

  • Join the new subreddit to:
    • Leave feedback
    • Participate in discussions about new features
    • Help find and fix issues
    • Just ask anything
  • Share it with everybody!

Your participation matters!
